attributes.action: Build an Asylum holding Centre in Ashtead Surrey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is raised in response to the attitude and resistance of the residents of Ashtead Surrey, to the purchase by SSAFA, of the property in Ashtead to provide temporary accomodation for visiting families of injured servicemen at Headley Court.  These residents obviously feel threatened by the presence of such people and would no doubt feel safer in the company of Muslim immigrants, on the grounds that they are unlikely to be targetted by those nasty doctors.
